column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We had the Chicago Deep Dish and it was great.  There's a solid layer of sausage on the whole pizza
column2: plenty of cheese -- but could've used a little more sauce
column3: in my opinion.  The crust was great.  It's crisp
column4: buttery and thin enough to let the toppings shine.  We shared the small 9" pie between the two of us but probably could've jumped up to a medium.
